img_summary: The image shows a decorative metal plate with a scalloped edge, resting on a stand. On the plate are four round, dark-colored objects that resemble balls or stones. The background is blurred but appears to depict a mural or painting with figures and architectural elements. The focus is primarily on the plate and its contents.
